column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Long story short: you can find pretty good ramen here. Jinya is a hip
column2: swanky little restaurant that usually has a long wait
column3: but it's worth it. I've only ever ordered the ramen here. The tonkotsu spicy is a solid choice (I usually get it extra hot)
column4: and I think it fares better than other ramen places like Tiger Den. I've also ordered the Cha Cha Cha (garlic ramen)
column6: I preferred Tiger Den's version. Service has been pretty good every time I've gone there.
